text: Ara yara bale, â€˜amara nasaraâ€™, tadera'o angikara amara grahana karechilama; atahpara taderake ye upadesa deya hayechila tara ekansa tara bhule giyeche. Phale amara tadera madhye kiyamata paryanta sthayi satruta o bidbesa jagaruka rekhechi [1]. Ara tara ya karata allaha acire'i taderake ta janiye debena
